scripts.dev: doppler run --project fondation --config dev_local -- concurrently "bun run dev:convex" "bun run dev:web" "bun run dev:worker"
scripts.dev:convex: rm -f convex/*.js convex/*.js.map convex/*.d.ts convex/*.d.ts.map 2>/dev/null; doppler run --project fondation --config dev_local -- bunx convex dev
scripts.dev:web: doppler run --project fondation --config dev_local -- sh -c 'cd packages/web && bun run dev'
scripts.dev:worker: doppler run --project fondation --config dev_local -- sh -c 'cd packages/worker && NODE_ENV=development bun run dev'
scripts.dev:worker:local: doppler run --project fondation --config dev_local -- sh -c 'cd packages/worker && NODE_ENV=development FONDATION_EXECUTION_MODE=local FONDATION_DEV_DOCKER_BYPASS=true bun run dev'
scripts.dev:worker:docker: doppler run --project fondation --config dev_local -- sh -c 'cd packages/worker && NODE_ENV=development FONDATION_EXECUTION_MODE=docker bun run dev'
scripts.dev:cli: doppler run --project fondation --config dev_local -- sh -c 'cd packages/cli && bun run dev'
scripts.dev:all: doppler run --project fondation --config dev_local -- concurrently "bun run dev:convex" "bun run dev:web" "bun run dev:worker" "bun run dev:cli"
scripts.dev:nodoppler: concurrently "bun run dev:convex" "bun run dev:web" "bun run dev:worker"
scripts.build: bun run build:shared && concurrently "bun run build:cli" "bun run build:web" "bun run build:worker"
scripts.build:docker: bun run build:cli && docker build -f packages/cli/Dockerfile.production -t fondation/cli:latest .
scripts.test: echo 'Running tests for all packages' && bun run test:cli && bun run test:web && bun run test:worker
scripts.clean: bun run clean:dist && bun run clean:cache
scripts.clean:all: bun run clean && bun run clean:modules
scripts.reset: bun run clean:all && bun install && bun run build
scripts.ci: bun run typecheck && bun run lint && bun run test && bun run build
scripts.prepush: bun run typecheck && bun run lint
scripts.precommit: bun run format:write && bun run lint:fix && bun run typecheck
scripts.docker:test: DOPPLER_TOKEN_WORKER=$(doppler configs tokens create test-$(date +%s) --project fondation --config prd --plain) && docker run --rm -e DOPPLER_TOKEN="$DOPPLER_TOKEN_WORKER" fondation/cli:latest --version
scripts.docker:deploy: DOPPLER_TOKEN_WORKER=$(doppler configs tokens create deployment-$(date +%Y%m%d) --project fondation --config prd --plain) && DOPPLER_TOKEN_WORKER="$DOPPLER_TOKEN_WORKER" docker-compose -f docker-compose.doppler.yml up -d
scripts.docker:analyze: DOPPLER_TOKEN_WORKER=$(doppler configs tokens create analyze-$(date +%s) --project fondation --config prd --plain) && DOPPLER_TOKEN_WORKER="$DOPPLER_TOKEN_WORKER" docker-compose -f docker-compose.doppler.yml run --rm -v "$PWD":/workspace -v "$PWD/output":/output worker analyze /workspace --output-dir /output
scripts.docker:clean: docker system prune -af && docker volume prune -f
scripts.e2e: bun run build && bun run dev
scripts.dev:worker:prod: cd packages/worker && NODE_ENV=production DOCKER_CONTAINER=true bun run dev
scripts.doppler:download: doppler secrets download --project fondation --config dev_local --no-file --format env > .env.doppler.local
scripts.doppler:validate: doppler run --project fondation --config dev_local -- node scripts/validate-secrets.js
